game.name: GIRL.EXE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You and your friends decided to summon a girl(friend?). Unfortunately, something went wrong. Can you get out or will you stay with her forever?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You and your friends decided to summon a girl(friend?). Unfortunately, something went wrong. Can you get out or will you stay with her forever?
